What is All Voices ?

All Voices is a graduate research project that will eventually become an open source web application. The purpose of this project is to open up channels of communication that will allow the opinions and ideas of women, children, and minorities be proportionately considered in municipal planning decisions. Follow along below!

About Mathew

Hi, I'm Mathew Dodds. I am a graduate Planning student at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Canada and a fullstack web developer. I am keenly interested in diversity, inclusion and civic engagement as well as their improvement via technology.
